name: Winford Wealth
long_description:
Personalized investing, tax and financial planning. A dedicated human advisor and all-in-one app — powered by AI, built for every net worth. We are an SEC Registered Investment Advisor, legally bound to act as a financial fiduciary to our customers. 

Our belief: 1% AUM fees from financial advisors are outdated and eat away at your wealth over the long-run. Winford Wealth offers the same level of quality & care starting at $14/month.

We also offer a tax-efficient managed cash account that goes beyond traditional and high yield savings accounts — allocating your idle dollars into high-quality, short-term bonds through money market funds, personalized for your taxes and goals. Included with Winford subscriptions or available on its own.
